page.shortlink: api ui html msg box function
page.description: Display a message box that supports HTML text. Width and Height are in inches by default.
page.syntax: Response_Code as N = ui_html_msg_box(C title ,C html_message [,N box_style [,N width [,N height [,L indented [,L UseWin3DBg [,C width_units [,C height_units [,C dlg_bg_color ]]]]]]]])

argument.name: title
argument.description: The title of the dialog box.

argument.name: box_style
argument.description: You form this message box variation by adding the values as you need from as many of the following groups in the format: value1 + value2 + value3.

argument.name: width
argument.description: Optional. Default = 2. The width of the HTML component in Horizontal_Units.

argument.name: height
argument.description: Optional. Default = 1. The height of the HTML component in Vertical_Units.

argument.name: indented
argument.description:
Optional. Default = .F.
.F. = Do not show indent.

item.name: .T. = use Win3D color for HTML component's background
.F. = allow the HTML component to set its background color

argument.name: width_units
argument.description:
Optional. Default = "inches". The unit of measurement for width. The options are:
"inches"
"cm"
"characters"

argument.name: height_units
argument.description: Optional. Default = "inches". The unit of measurement for height. The options are:

argument.name: dlg_bg_color
argument.description: Optional. Default = Win3D. The color of the background.

page.discussion: The UI_HTML_MSG_BOX() function displays a message box that includes a window that may contain any HTML content.

section.title: Example
section.example: a_result = ui_html_msg_box(title_var, message_text_var, UI_OK + UI_FIRST_BUTTON_DEFAULT + UI_INFORMATION_SYMBOL, 2, 1, .t., .f., "inches", "inches", "Win3D")
